item.description:
For our first spring trading event We'll be meeting at the Enon Village community room in Wenham, so there is plenty of space for trading and parking. Time: 1-3 pm

The basic idea is to trade your extra stuff for other peoples extra stuff. Think fresh or preserved foods, handmade items, garden implements, seeds, plants, eggs, tools, composting worms....etc.

The general rules: 
Meet and greet at 1:00 
Trading starts at 1:30 
No cash exchanged but you may gift things to someone 
Preserved foods should have a label with ingredients 
Items that you have not swapped or gifted go home with you for the next time 
Wrap up at 3:00

And please post a hint of your offerings and anything you're seeking in the comments section!
item.why: We have things we want to let go of, and things we want to get. Let's trade!
item.name: North of Boston Trading Event
